001package fourier;
002
003import java.awt.Dimension;
004import java.awt.GridLayout;
005import java.awt.Point;
006import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
007import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
008import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
009import java.util.Arrays;
010
011import javax.swing.JPanel;
012import javax.swing.JPopupMenu;
013
014import javax.swing.AbstractAction;
015import javax.swing.JComponent;
016import javax.swing.JMenuItem;
017
018/**
019 * 二次元フーリエ変換のデータを持つクラス
020 */
021public class Fourier2dModel extends FourierModel {
022
023        private int previousX;
024        private int previousY;
025        /**
026         * 元画像の配列データ
027         */
028        protected double[][] sourceData;
029
030        /**
031         * フーリエ変換後の実部
032         */
033        protected double[][] realPart;
034
035        /**
036         * フーリエ変換後の虚部
037         */
038        protected double[][] imaginaryPart;
039
040        /**
041         * パワースペクトルを持つ
042         */
043        protected double[][] powerSpectrum;
044
045        /**
046         * マウス操作で変更可能な実部
047         */
048        protected double[][] interactiveRealPart;
049
050        /**
051         * マウス操作で変更可能な虚部
052         */
053        protected double[][] interactiveImarginaryPart;
054
055        /**
056         * マウス操作で変更可能なパワースペクトル
057         */
058        protected double[][] interactivePowerSpectrum;
059
060        /**
061         * 逆変換を施した画像
062         */
063        protected double[][] inverseData;
064
065        /**
066         * 元画像のPaneModel
067         */
068        protected FourierPaneModel sourceDataPaneModel = null;
069
070        /**
071         * パワースペクトル画像のPaneModel
072         */
073        protected FourierPaneModel powerSpectrumPaneModel = null;
074
075        /**
076         * 操作可能なパワースペクトル画像のPaneModel
077         */
078        protected FourierPaneModel interactivePowerSpectrumPaneModel = null;
079
080        /**
081         * 逆変換画像のPaneModel
082         */
083
084        protected FourierPaneModel interactiveDataPaneModel = null;
085        /**
086         * カラー画像を格納する配列。
087         * 2次元配列を要素にもつ
088         */
089        double[][][] yuvSourceData;
090
091        /**
092         * 
093         *
094         * @author Takakura
095         * @version 1.0
096         * @date 7/14
097         */
098        public Fourier2dModel() {
099                super();
100                this.setSourceData(FourierModel.dataFourierGrayScale(), yuvSourceData);
101
102        }
103
104        /**
105         * 
106         *
107         * @author Nakamura Hayami
108         * @version 1.2
109         * @date 7/15
110         * @param anActionEvent
111         */
112        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent anActionEvent) {
113                if (yuvSourceData == null) {
114                        sourceDataPaneModel.picture(FourierModel.generateImageForData(sourceData));
115                        DiscreteFourier2dTransformation aTransformation = new DiscreteFourier2dTransformation(sourceData);
116                        powerSpectrumPaneModel.picture(FourierModel.generateImageForData(aTransformation.swap(powerSpectrum)));
117                        interactivePowerSpectrumPaneModel
118                                        .picture(FourierModel.generateImageForData(aTransformation.swap(interactivePowerSpectrum)));
119                        computeInverseData();
120                        interactiveDataPaneModel.picture(FourierModel.generateImageForData(inverseData));
121                } else {
122                        sourceDataPaneModel.picture(FourierModel.generateImageForData(yuvSourceData));
123                        DiscreteFourier2dTransformation aTransformation = new DiscreteFourier2dTransformation(yuvSourceData[0]);
124                        powerSpectrumPaneModel.picture(FourierModel.generateImageForData(aTransformation.swap(powerSpectrum)));
125                        interactivePowerSpectrumPaneModel
126                                        .picture(FourierModel.generateImageForData(aTransformation.swap(interactivePowerSpectrum)));
127                        computeInverseData();
128                        if (FourierModel.isAllZero(inverseData) == true) {
129                                double[][][] yuvInverseMatrixes = new double[][][] { inverseData,
130                                                inverseData, inverseData };
131                                interactiveDataPaneModel.picture(FourierModel.generateImageForData(yuvInverseMatrixes));
132                        } else {
133                                double[][][] yuvInverseMatrixes = new double[][][] { inverseData,
134                                                yuvSourceData[1], yuvSourceData[2] };
135                                interactiveDataPaneModel.picture(FourierModel.generateImageForData(yuvInverseMatrixes));
136                        }
137
138                }
139
140                sourceDataPaneModel.changed();
141                powerSpectrumPaneModel.changed();
142                interactiveDataPaneModel.changed();
143                interactivePowerSpectrumPaneModel.changed();
144        }
145
146        /**
147         * Pointからinteractiveな配列を操作する
148         * @author Takakura,Nakamura
149         * @version 1.1
150         * @date 7/15
151         * @param aPoint
152         * @param isAltDown
153         */
154        public void computeFromPoint(Point aPoint, boolean isAltDown) {
155                int x = (int) aPoint.getX();
156                int y = (int) aPoint.getY();
157
158                int[] xySwap = int2dSwap(x, y, powerSpectrum[0].length);
159                int swapX = xySwap[0];
160                int swapY = xySwap[1];
161                xySwap = int2dSwap(previousX, previousY, powerSpectrum[0].length);
162                int swapPreviousX = xySwap[0];
163                int swapPreviousY = xySwap[1];
164
165                if (previousX == -1 || previousY == -1 || Math.abs(swapX -
166                                swapPreviousX) > 30 || Math.abs(swapY - swapPreviousY) > 30) {
167                        previousX = x;
168                        previousY = y;
169                }
170
171                if (isAltDown) {
172                        if (previousX >= x && previousY >= y) {
173                                x = x - 5;
174                                y = y - 5;
175                                previousX = previousX + 5;
176                                previousY = previousY + 5;
177
178                                for (int j = x; j <= previousX; j++) {
179                                        for (int i = y; i <= previousY; i++) {
180                                                xySwap = int2dSwap(j, i, powerSpectrum[0].length);
181                                                interactiveRealPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
182                                                interactiveImarginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
183                                                interactivePowerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
184                                        }
185                                }
186                        } else if (previousX >= x && previousY < y) {
187                                x = x - 5;
188                                y = y + 5;
189                                previousX = previousX + 5;
190                                previousY = previousY - 5;
191
192                                for (int j = x; j <= previousX; j++) {
193                                        for (int i = previousY; i <= y; i++) {
194                                                xySwap = int2dSwap(j, i, powerSpectrum[0].length);
195                                                interactiveRealPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
196                                                interactiveImarginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
197                                                interactivePowerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
198                                        }
199
200                                }
201                        } else if (previousX < x && previousY >= y) {
202                                x = x + 5;
203                                y = y - 5;
204                                previousX = previousX - 5;
205                                previousY = previousY + 5;
206
207                                for (int j = previousX; j <= x; j++) {
208                                        for (int i = y; i <= previousY; i++) {
209                                                xySwap = int2dSwap(j, i, powerSpectrum[0].length);
210                                                interactiveRealPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
211                                                interactiveImarginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
212                                                interactivePowerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
213                                        }
214                                }
215                        } else if (previousX < x && previousY < y) {
216                                x = x + 5;
217                                y = y + 5;
218                                previousX = previousX - 5;
219                                previousY = previousY - 5;
220
221                                for (int j = previousX; j <= x; j++) {
222                                        for (int i = previousY; i <= y; i++) {
223                                                xySwap = int2dSwap(j, i, powerSpectrum[0].length);
224                                                interactiveRealPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
225                                                interactiveImarginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
226                                                interactivePowerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = 0.0;
227                                        }
228                                }
229
230                        }
231
232                        else {
233                                interactiveRealPart[y][x] = 0.0;
234                                interactivePowerSpectrum[y][x] = 0.0;
235                                interactivePowerSpectrum[y][x] = 0.0;
236                                previousX = -1;
237                                previousY = -1;
238                        }
239                        return;
240                } else {
241
242                        if (previousX >= x && previousY >= y) {
243                                x = x - 5;
244                                y = y - 5;
245                                previousX = previousX + 5;
246                                previousY = previousY + 5;
247
248                                for (int j = x; j <= previousX; j++) {
249                                        for (int i = y; i <= previousY; i++) {
250                                                xySwap = int2dSwap(j, i, powerSpectrum[0].length);
251                                                interactiveRealPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = realPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
252                                                interactiveImarginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = imaginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
253                                                interactivePowerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = powerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
254                                        }
255                                }
256                        } else if (previousX >= x && previousY < y) {
257                                x = x - 5;
258                                y = y + 5;
259                                previousX = previousX + 5;
260                                previousY = previousY - 5;
261
262                                for (int j = x; j <= previousX; j++) {
263                                        for (int i = previousY; i <= y; i++) {
264                                                xySwap = int2dSwap(j, i, powerSpectrum[0].length);
265                                                interactiveRealPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = realPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
266                                                interactiveImarginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = imaginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
267                                                interactivePowerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = powerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
268                                        }
269
270                                }
271                        } else if (previousX < x && previousY >= y) {
272                                x = x + 5;
273                                y = y - 5;
274                                previousX = previousX - 5;
275                                previousY = previousY + 5;
276
277                                for (int j = previousX; j <= x; j++) {
278                                        for (int i = y; i <= previousY; i++) {
279                                                xySwap = int2dSwap(j, i, powerSpectrum[0].length);
280                                                interactiveRealPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = realPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
281                                                interactiveImarginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = imaginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
282                                                interactivePowerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = powerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
283                                        }
284                                }
285                        } else if (previousX < x && previousY < y) {
286                                x = x + 5;
287                                y = y + 5;
288                                previousX = previousX - 5;
289                                previousY = previousY - 5;
290
291                                for (int j = previousX; j <= x; j++) {
292                                        for (int i = previousY; i <= y; i++) {
293                                                xySwap = int2dSwap(j, i, powerSpectrum[0].length);
294                                                interactiveRealPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = realPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
295                                                interactiveImarginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = imaginaryPart[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
296                                                interactivePowerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]] = powerSpectrum[xySwap[1]][xySwap[0]];
297                                        }
298                                }
299
300                        }
301
302                        else {
303                                interactiveRealPart[y][x] = realPart[y][x];
304                                interactivePowerSpectrum[y][x] = powerSpectrum[y][x];
305                                interactivePowerSpectrum[y][x] = powerSpectrum[y][x];
306                                previousX = -1;
307                                previousY = -1;
308                        }
309                        return;
310                }
311        }
312
313        /**
314         * 現在のインタラクティブな配列から逆変換処理を行う
315         * @author Nakamura
316         * @version 1.0
317         * @date 7/8
318         */
319        public void computeInverseData() {
320                // マウス操作後呼び出される？
321                DiscreteFourier2dTransformation anInverseTransform = new DiscreteFourier2dTransformation(interactiveRealPart, interactiveImarginaryPart);
322                inverseData = anInverseTransform.inverseRealPart();
323                return;
324        }
325
326        /**
327         * インタラクティブな配列をそれぞれの配列と同等にする
328         * @author Nakamura Hayami
329         * @version 1.2
330         * @date 7/17
331         */
332        public void doAllSpectrum() {
333                DiscreteFourier2dTransformation aTransform = new DiscreteFourier2dTransformation(sourceData);
334                interactivePowerSpectrum = aTransform.normalizedLogarithmicPowerSpectrum();
335                interactiveRealPart = aTransform.realPart();
336                interactiveImarginaryPart = aTransform.imaginaryPart();
337                computeInverseData();
338                this.actionPerformed(null);
339        }
340
341        /**
342         * interactiveデータをリセットする
343         *
344         * @author Takakura Hayami
345         * @version 1.1
346         * @date 7/26
347         */
348        public void doClearSpectrum() {
349                this.setSourceData(sourceData, yuvSourceData);
350                this.actionPerformed(null);
351        }
352
353        /**
354         * 操作対象をカラー画像に変更する
355         *
356         * @author Takakura
357         * @version 1.0
358         * @date  7/14
359         */
360        public void doFourierColor() {
361                double[][][] yuvMatrixes = FourierModel.dataFourierColor();
362                this.setSourceData(yuvMatrixes[0], yuvMatrixes);
363                this.actionPerformed(null);
364                return;
365        }
366
367        /**
368         * 操作対象をグレースケール画像に変更する
369         *
370         * @author Takakura,Nakamura
371         * @version 1.1
372         * @date 7/15
373         */
374        public void doFourierGrayScale() {
375                this.setSourceData(FourierModel.dataFourierGrayScale(), null);
376                this.actionPerformed(null);
377                return;
378        }
379
380        /**
381         * マウスクリックの時の動作を決定
382         *
383         * @author Takakura
384         * @version 1.0
385         * @date 7/14
386         * @param aPoint
387         * @param aMouseEvent
388         */
389        public void mouseClicked(Point aPoint, MouseEvent aMouseEvent) {
390                computeFromPoint(aPoint, aMouseEvent.isAltDown());
391                this.actionPerformed(null);
392                return;
393        }
394
395        /**
396         * マウスドラッグの時の動作を決定
397         *
398         * @author Takakura,Nakamura
399         * @version 1.1
400         * @date 7/14
401         * @param aPoint
402         * @param aMouseEvent
403         */
404        public void mouseDragged(Point aPoint, MouseEvent aMouseEvent) {
405                computeFromPoint(aPoint, aMouseEvent.isAltDown());
406                // Alt(option)が押されると消すモード、逆は書くモード
407                this.actionPerformed(null);
408                previousX = (int) aPoint.getX();
409                previousY = (int) aPoint.getY();
410                return;
411        }
412
413        /**
414         * ウィンドウを開ける
415         *
416         * @author Takakura
417         * @version 1.0
418         * @date 7/14
419         */
420        public void open() {
421                GridLayout aLayout = new GridLayout(2, 2);
422                JPanel aPanel = new JPanel(aLayout);
423                Dimension aDimension = new Dimension();
424                aDimension.width = sourceData[0].length;
425                aDimension.height = sourceData[1].length;
426                DiscreteFourier2dTransformation aTransformation = new DiscreteFourier2dTransformation(sourceData);
427                BufferedImage imageSourceData = FourierModel.generateImageForData(sourceData);
428                this.sourceDataPaneModel = new FourierPaneModel(imageSourceData, "sourceData", this);
429                FourierPaneView aView = new FourierPaneView(sourceDataPaneModel, new FourierPaneController());
430                this.sourceDataPaneModel.addDependent(aView);
431                aPanel.add(aView);
432
433                BufferedImage imagePowerSpectrum = FourierModel.generateImageForData(aTransformation.swap(powerSpectrum));
434                this.powerSpectrumPaneModel = new FourierPaneModel(imagePowerSpectrum, "powerSpectrum", this);
435                aView = new FourierPaneView(powerSpectrumPaneModel, new FourierPaneController());
436                this.powerSpectrumPaneModel.addDependent(aView);
437                aPanel.add(aView);
438
439                BufferedImage imageInverseData = FourierModel.generateImageForData(inverseData);
440                this.interactiveDataPaneModel = new FourierPaneModel(imageInverseData, "inverseData", this);
441                aView = new FourierPaneView(interactiveDataPaneModel, new FourierPaneController());
442                this.interactiveDataPaneModel.addDependent(aView);
443                aPanel.add(aView);
444
445                BufferedImage imageinteractivePowerSpectrum = FourierModel
446                                .generateImageForData(aTransformation.swap(interactivePowerSpectrum));
447                this.interactivePowerSpectrumPaneModel = new FourierPaneModel(imageinteractivePowerSpectrum,
448                                "interactivePowerSpectrum", this);
449                aView = new FourierPaneView(interactivePowerSpectrumPaneModel, new FourierPaneController());
450                this.interactivePowerSpectrumPaneModel.addDependent(aView);
451                aPanel.add(aView);
452
453                Example2d.open(aPanel, aDimension);
454
455        }
456
457        /**
458         * 配列の設定を行う
459         *
460         * @author Takakura,Hayami,Nakamura
461         * @version 1.2
462         * @date 7/26
463         * @param sourceDataMatrix
464         * @param yuvMatrixes
465         */
466        public void setSourceData(double[][] sourceDataMatrix, double[][][] yuvMatrixes) {
467                this.sourceData = sourceDataMatrix;
468                this.yuvSourceData = yuvMatrixes;
469                DiscreteFourier2dTransformation aTransformation = new DiscreteFourier2dTransformation(sourceData);
470                this.realPart = aTransformation.realPart();
471                this.imaginaryPart = aTransformation.imaginaryPart();
472                this.powerSpectrum = aTransformation.normalizedLogarithmicPowerSpectrum();
473
474                FourierModel.fill(interactiveRealPart = Arrays.stream(realPart).map(double[]::clone).toArray(double[][]::new), 0.0);
475                FourierModel.fill(interactiveImarginaryPart = Arrays.stream(imaginaryPart).map(double[]::clone).toArray(double[][]::new), 0.0);
476                FourierModel.fill(interactivePowerSpectrum = Arrays.stream(powerSpectrum).map(double[]::clone).toArray(double[][]::new), 0.0);
477                FourierModel.fill(inverseData = Arrays.stream(sourceDataMatrix).map(double[]::clone).toArray(double[][]::new), 0.0);
478                previousX = -1;
479                previousY = -1;
480                return;
481        }
482
483        /**
484         * ポップアップメニューの設定
485         *
486         * @author Takakura
487         * @version
488         * @date
489         * @param aMouseEvent
490         * @param aController
491         */
492        public void showPopupMenu(MouseEvent aMouseEvent, FourierPaneController aController) {
493                JPopupMenu popupMenu = new JPopupMenu();
494                // 項目の作成と追加
495                JMenuItem allSpectrumItem = new JMenuItem();
496                Runnable allSpectrumRunner = () -> {
497                        doAllSpectrum();
498                };
499                allSpectrumItem.setAction(new Method2dAction("all Spectrum", allSpectrumRunner));
500
501                JMenuItem clearSpectrumItem = new JMenuItem();
502                Runnable clearSpectrumRunner = () -> {
503                        doClearSpectrum();
504                };
505                clearSpectrumItem.setAction(new Method2dAction("clear Spectrum", clearSpectrumRunner));
506
507                JMenuItem fourierColorItem = new JMenuItem();
508                Runnable fourierColorRunner = () -> {
509                        doFourierColor();
510                };
511                fourierColorItem.setAction(new Method2dAction("fourier Color", fourierColorRunner));
512
513                JMenuItem fourierGrayScaleItem = new JMenuItem();
514                Runnable fourierGrayScaleRunner = () -> {
515                        doFourierGrayScale();
516                };
517                fourierGrayScaleItem.setAction(new Method2dAction("fourier Gray Scale", fourierGrayScaleRunner));
518
519                popupMenu.add(fourierColorItem);
520                popupMenu.add(fourierGrayScaleItem);
521
522                popupMenu.addSeparator();
523
524                popupMenu.add(allSpectrumItem);
525                popupMenu.add(clearSpectrumItem);
526
527                popupMenu.show((JComponent) aMouseEvent.getSource(), aMouseEvent.getX(), aMouseEvent.getY());
528        }
529
530        /**
531         * パワースペクトル操作のための座標変換メソッド
532         * @author Nakamura
533         * @version 1.1
534         * @date 7/15
535         * @param swapX
536         * @param swapY
537         * @param length
538         * @return
539         */
540        public int[] int2dSwap(int swapX, int swapY, int length) {
541                if (swapX < 0)
542                        swapX = 0;
543                if (swapY < 0)
544                        swapY = 0;
545                if (length < swapX)
546                        swapX = length;
547                if (length < swapY)
548                        swapY = length;
549                int halfLength = length / 2;
550                int aValue[] = new int[2];
551                if (swapX < halfLength && swapY < halfLength) {
552
553                        aValue[0] = swapX + halfLength;
554                        aValue[1] = swapY + halfLength;
555                } else if (swapX < halfLength && swapY >= halfLength) {
556                        aValue[0] = swapX + halfLength;
557                        aValue[1] = swapY - halfLength;
558                } else if (swapX >= halfLength && swapY < halfLength) {
559                        aValue[0] = swapX - halfLength;
560                        aValue[1] = swapY + halfLength;
561                } else {
562                        aValue[0] = swapX - halfLength;
563                        aValue[1] = swapY - halfLength;
564                }
565                return aValue;
566        }
567
568}
569
570@SuppressWarnings("serial")
571class Method2dAction extends AbstractAction {
572        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
573        private Runnable handleCallback = null;
574
575        public Method2dAction(String actionName, Runnable handleCallback) {
576                super(actionName);
577                this.handleCallback = handleCallback;
578        }
579
580        @Override
581        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
582
583                this.handleCallback.run();
584        }
585
586}
